text: If God has allowed me to earn so much money, it is because He knows I give it all away.
author: Edith Piaf

text: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.
author: David Geffen

text: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older.
author: John Maynard Keynes

text: It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate.
author: Gloria Steinem

text: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
author: Joe Moore
